item.title: How would I add a kill point when I kill an npc
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Like, for example if you killed the zombie, and the server was restarted, the zombie would be there again. What you want is something like when you kill Dharok in the barrows and the server gets restarted, hes still dead. Having the NPC dead is put in a file with the player, so… yeah.

item.title: How would I add a kill point when I kill an npc
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Ok, when the zombie dies, do you want the point to go to the server, or the player? Cause how you have it set up makes it go to the server.

Also , it would be

if(zombie.isDead){
zombir.DeadApply=true;
zombie.needRespawn = true;
zombieKillz++;
}

Read full topic

item.title: How would I add a kill point when I kill an npc
item.dc:creator: @jonyo jonyo
item.description:
@jonyo wrote:

like say I make something called zombiekills. first of all, would I set it up like this?

public void zombiekills() { zombiekills = 0; }

but then how would I add a point like when I kill a zombie I know this is wrong but this is just an example

if killnpc(76){ zombiekills +=1; }

how would I format that? thanks for the help
